ValidationRule.description: Contact result mandatory if task is completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(Contains(Current_User_Profile__c,"Webdam")), ISPICKVAL (Status, "Completed"), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Meeting Booked")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Customer: Important Date")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Customer Check-in")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Demo")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Dynamic Template Test")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "IT/Security Question")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Product Question")), NOT (ISPICKVAL (Contact_Type__c, "Trial Account")), NOT(CONTAINS(Subject,"Call: No Answer")), ISPICKVAL (Contact_Result__c, ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the contact result for completed tasks.
